basics.name: Kevin Wong
basics.label: Computer Science student and student web developer at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa
basics.summary: I am studying for a Bachelor's in Science in Computer Science at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate at the end of Spring, 2021.

work.summary: Management and Web development of University of Hawai'i at Manoa websites
highlights: Developing website application by problem solving issues which requires the use of full stack developmental skills, algorithmic thinking, database management, and teamwork
Assist various project teams with the development and maintenance of system-wide web applications

work.summary: Caring for our customers one customer at a time
highlights: Careful management of the bank as well as customer's finances and resources by the use of the bank's balance by utilizing it's budgets and checks
Maintaining trust and exceptional customer service
